name: Sebastian Arcila-Valenzuela
body:
I love to try new things like Bungee jumping and Hang gliding (the next in the line is skydiving), I alsoI like to play soccer and volleyball, watch soccer games with my friends. 

You can find my open source contributions on [GitHub](https://github.com/sarcilav) and some random thoughts at my [blog](http://blog.sarcilav.com/).

Some of my past employers include [we<3it](http://weheartit.com/), [StackBuilders](http://stackbuilders.com/) and [Art.sy](http://artsy.net/). 

You can contact me at [sebastianarcila@gmail.com](mailto:sebastianarcila@gmail.com) or [@sarcilav](https://twitter.com/sarcilav).

And when I'm not playing or working, I use to compete on Google Code Jam, TopCoder or ICPC.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
